mapper.insert: insert into member (memberid,userid,password,username,zip_Code,address,addr_Detail, phoneNumber,email, ROLE,STATUS) values(SUJUNG.MEMBERID_SEQ.nextval, #{userid},#{password},#{username},#{zip_Code},#{address},#{addr_Detail}, #{phoneNumber},#{email},'ROLE_User','Active')
mapper.update: update member set zip_Code = #{zip_Code}, address = #{address}, addr_Detail = #{addr_Detail}, phoneNumber = #{phoneNumber}, email = #{email} where userid = #{userid}
mapper.select: select MEMBERID,userid,password,username,zip_Code,address,addr_Detail, phoneNumber,email from member where userid = #{userid} and PASSWORD = #{password}
select userid,password,username,zip_Code,address,addr_Detail, phoneNumber,email from member where userid = #{userid}
